text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia polyantha is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.  Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. 2003.  Tillandsia polyantha.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
